oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Joe Allen, (Uncle) Daniel, John Best 1926 Note
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Edwin Best
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greenback (Tenn.); Best, Joe Allen; Best, Edwin;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Edwin Best, Jr.'s information about Daniel, his uncle (Joe Allen) and his father (Edwin Best). Daniel's last name could not be verified; presumably it is Best.
